website_summaries.verdict: This toner has AHAs (glycolic and lactic acids), witch hazel, and botanical extracts to fade dark spots in as little as a week.
pros: Users see quick results, with smoother and softer skin and a noticeable reduction in hyperpigmentation
It also helps to fade rosacea
Tones without alcohol, so won't dry out skin
cons: The fragrance is too strong for some

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: It didn't make me break out. It also didn't lighten any dark spots or improve my skin tone. I might as well have splashed water on my face. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Good Toner but Not Brightening
customer_reviews.text: Good toner for skin texture. Did not improve dark spots and 1/2 bottle has been used 2x a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing I can say about this product is that it smells nice. Don't bother buying it to get rid of dark spots/pigmentation -- it doesn't work!!! Big waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Strange packaging
customer_reviews.text: I received the package today and the lid was already open ! Plus the inside of the package had some white stuff around it ! I don’t believe it was an original packaging
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Damaged bottle
customer_reviews.text: The bottle arrived damaged and not full because it leaked. Haven’t had any changes to my skin after using for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Skin is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My redness has decreased great after just a month of using this!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Grice

customer_reviews.title: Burning sensation
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, dehydrated skin and when I put this on, I felt a burning, tingling sensation that lasted minutes. Almost like it was never meant to be for dry skins. Toners aren’t supposed to burn and if it does, you need to use a gentle one. The only reason why I bought this is because a Sephora staff recommended me this product for eliminating my dark spots. I don’t recommend this for dry skin. It feels like my protective layer has been violated.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON CUSTOMER ✨✨

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging and unsealed cosmetic
customer_reviews.text: The package came heavily damaged and the seal not attached to the container. No way would I put this on my face without knowing it hasn't been compromised. Waiting on a replacement before before I make any updates.
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Love Ole Henkriksen! I use two of their toners and each has improved the overall look & health of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little progress
customer_reviews.text: Burns a little. Haven’t seen a huge difference in my skin. But I am seeing little progress. I may buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGING COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this brand but this was definitely a (dangerous) miss for me. It broke my skin out and cause cystic acne. I also used their banana bright eye cream and it was awful. It gave me chemical burns under my eyes that lasted for weeks. DO NOT USE.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Not to claim that it is one of the best
customer_reviews.text: The add claimed to be one of the best spot removers I used it religiously and saw no results
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carella

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this product in my nighttime routine. Makes me feel like I have glowing skin. So happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Alcantar

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The smell is good and it is a great toner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this every night since received. My skin looks great! Note - there is a tingle when you apply that some people might find irritating. It's very mild and, to me, indicates that it's working!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: pricey for the size
customer_reviews.text: This smells soooooo good and feels very refreshing. For the price, I would liked the container slightly larger as it ran out so quickly. I didn't or haven't seen any TONE difference on my skin, so for this price I will keep looking for that shows results
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty intense toner—save this one for the pm!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve been using this long enough to tell if it’s been lightening any of my post-acne scars, but it’s definitely an intense toner that chemically exfoliates my acne prone and oily skin. Be careful of applying this to any open wounds/pimples—it will sting. My skin barrier has been compromised recently (PMS, dry air, cold weather) and so my usually oily skin is currently both oily and very dehydrated, which causes dry patches all over. So, I’ve had to reduce usage of the toner because I felt like it would just hurt all over and dry me out more.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have used the entire bottle. I used it faithfully morning and night. I have seen no difference at all. It was an expensive failure. I cannot recommend it over any of the much less expensive toners. My dark spots showed no change whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: L. Housden

customer_reviews.title: Best toner out there
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I love that it doesn’t overly dry my skin. It make my skin feel so soft and definitely has helped the fine lines under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Remine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: You will not be disappointed by the performance of this toner.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sheng

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product however this buyer clearly tampered with this product. I opened the package and could tell the seal had already been removed and then replaced. I love this product and had bought this from amazon as a replacement for my current empty bottle that I purchased from Sephora. I compared the smell of the replacement product ordered from this buyer to the bottle I bought from Sephora and the smell was completely different. I would not advise purchasing from this buyer- I do not know what this product was mixed with but it’s very apparent that this was either watered down or tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the trial size!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my trial size of this product today. It is obvious the bottle has already been opened. I made a mistake purchasing the trial size at such a rip-off price. $14.99 for this tiny bottle was stupid for me to pay. If I could return it, I would. Unfortunately, I was anxious to try this product but should have bought the full size, which is returnable. Big, big mistake on my part!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
